text: “Israelia uan purirpenibar ikiamin danganiba aghuva, gumaziba vaghvagh uan anababar ziaba itir fleghɨn boroghɨn uan adarazi ko dapiam, eghtɨ God bativamin Purirpenim, danganir kamɨn tongɨra ikiam. Men purirpeniba tong Godɨn Purirpenimɨn saghon ikɨ, eghtɨ dar tiar akaba an amadaghan mɨtuagh ikɨ.
